pages.text: One of the first things I tried with the new infusion table is a way to move a bit more distant from the crucible. Now that I have a safer way to craft I would like to do it outside the splash zone.$(br2)Given the spreading capabilities of the tears, it turned out to be pretty easy to do.

There are a few other variants that look to be useful, especially if I can transfer more than just tears:$(li)The gated tear duct can only connect when it is powered with redstone.$(li)The one way tear duct is a straight piece that can only transfer in one direction.
